name: Lisa is Fearless: PAIN MODE
description:
Pain mode for lisa is fearless (by TheGangstaKnownAsBob)

THIS MOD IS NOT OFFICIAL, WE HAVE NO IDEA IF IT CAN BE CONSIDERED CANON TO THE ORIGINAL LISA IS FEARLESS, IF I SEE ONE OF YOU MFS TALKING "Damn... is this actually canon?" I'M GONNA PERSONALLY SKIN YOU

What to expect:

  • Pain mode, as the title suggests
  • Harder fights, balanced enough I think
  • Robin using combos
  • 1 new party member for the normal route
  • Some tweaks to party members
  • Faizal route, with a couple completely new party members, and a new moveset for Robin

Dev team:

  • MuuMan
  • AAA
  • Ruby
  • Termskii The Amazing
  • GunGod64

If you find bugs I might fix em but ion really care and I'm tired from working on this.
